title: (x) GAP/INC/DEPT-style condensed serif face - various {gang}
content:
These three brands all use the same kind of font, any suggestions?

GAP  
 [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0005/6970/brand.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164202/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0005/6970/brand.gif "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0005/6970/brand.gif")

INC International Concepts  
 [http://www.macys.com/campaign/inc/index.jsp](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164202/http:/www.macys.com/campaign/inc/index.jsp "http://www.macys.com/campaign/inc/index.jsp")

DEPT  
 [http://www.jcrags.com/en/images/dept\_logo\_big.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164202/http:/www.jcrags.com/en/images/dept_logo_big.gif "http://www.jcrags.com/en/images/dept\_logo\_big.gif")
author: Chris82

comments.content: FF Kath Condensed and [Spire](http://web.archive.org/web/20140117164202/http:/typophile.com/node/30653) might float your boat. Please do a search first when you know what you're looking for. ;^)

That's strange I did use the search.. didn't come up with anything.  
Well thanks guys!
